name: Butter Chicken
ingredients: chicken, tomato puree, cream, butter, ginger, garlic, spices
cooking_method: Marinate chicken with ginger, garlic, and spices.
Cook chicken in a pan until browned.
In a separate pan, sauté ginger and garlic in butter.
Add tomato puree and spices and cook for a few minutes.
Add cream and cooked chicken to the sauce and simmer until the chicken is cooked through.
Serve hot with naan or rice.

name: Chana Masala
ingredients: chickpeas, tomato, onion, ginger, garlic, spices
cooking_method: Soak chickpeas overnight.
Pressure cook chickpeas until tender.
In a pan, sauté onions, ginger, and garlic.
Add chopped tomatoes and spices and cook until the tomatoes are soft.
Add the cooked chickpeas to the pan and simmer for a few minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve hot with rice or naan.

name: Palak Paneer
ingredients: spinach, paneer, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, spices
cooking_method: Blanch spinach leaves in boiling water for a minute and then blend them into a smooth puree.
Sauté onions, ginger, and garlic in a pan until golden brown.
Add chopped tomatoes and spices and cook for a few minutes.
Add the spinach puree to the pan and cook until it thickens.
Add cubed paneer and simmer for a few minutes.
Garnish with cream and serve hot with naan or rice.

name: Biryani
ingredients: basmati rice, chicken, spices, onion, tomato, yogurt
cooking_method: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 30 minutes.
Cook rice with whole spices until it's half cooked.
Sauté onions and tomatoes in a separate pan.
Layer rice and chicken in a large pot, starting with rice at the bottom.
Add the sautéed onions and tomatoes on top of the chicken layer.
Cover and cook on low heat for about 20-25 minutes.
Serve hot with raita or chutney.

name: Samosa
cooking_method: Boil and mash potatoes and mix with spices and peas.
Make a dough with flour and water.
Roll out the dough and cut into circles.
Fill each circle with the potato mixture and fold into a triangle.
Fry in hot oil until golden brown.
Serve hot with chutney or ketchup.

name: Tandoori Chicken
ingredients: chicken, yogurt, spices, lemon juice, ginger garlic paste
cooking_method: Marinate chicken in yogurt, spices, lemon juice, and ginger garlic paste for at least 2 hours.
Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Place the marinated chicken on a baking tray and bake for about 30-35 minutes, turning once halfway through.
Serve hot with mint chutney and naan.

name: Tandoori Chicken
